changes_made: Enhanced documentation with comprehensive security context
Added proper British spellings throughout documentation
Implemented actor-based KeyManagementActor for thread safety
Created formal KeyStorage protocol for standardisation
Implemented factory patterns for dependency management
Improved error handling with descriptive error messages
Fixed dependencies in SecurityProviderImpl to use new actor-based implementation
Added comprehensive logging throughout all operations
notes: Successfully migrated to Alpha Dot Five architecture with actor-based implementation and comprehensive integration with the KeychainServices module. All components follow British spelling conventions in documentation and include detailed security guidance. The module now provides factory methods for simplified instantiation and maintains backward compatibility with legacy implementations.
